Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim

= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= man; ◄ son of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) and Zillah (צִלָּה) descendant of Cain (קַיִן) ► known for his ability to forge bronze and iron; brother of Naamah (נַעֲמָה)
= woman; ◄ daughter of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) descendant of Cain (קַיִן)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Methushael (מְתוּשָׁאֵל) descendant of Cain (קַיִן) ► father of Jabal (יָבָל) Jubal (יוּבַל) and Tubal Cain (תּוּבַל קַיִן)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= woman; ► wife of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ)
= woman; ► wife of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) and mother of Tubal Cain (תּוּבַל קַיִן) worker in bronze and iron tools
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= man; ◄ son of Methushael (מְתוּשָׁאֵל) descendant of Cain (קַיִן) ► father of Jabal (יָבָל) Jubal (יוּבַל) and Tubal Cain (תּוּבַל קַיִן)
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= area of physical damage on the body; ◄ caused by accident or aggression; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to refer to difficult circumstances
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= area of physical damage on the body; ◄ caused by sickness or aggression; ≈ sometimes used in a figurative sense to refer to difficult circumstances
= state in which an event is to be repeated seven times
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= man; ◄ first son of Adam (אָדָם) and Eve (חַוָּה) ► possible ancestor of the Kenites (קֵינִי)
= man; ◄ son of Methushael (מְתוּשָׁאֵל) descendant of Cain (קַיִן) ► father of Jabal (יָבָל) Jubal (יוּבַל) and Tubal Cain (תּוּבַל קַיִן)
= state in which a countable entity is seventy in number
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
literally: to know (someone physically); hence: = action by which two people have sexual relations with one another
= first man; ◄ created by God; ► husband of Eve (חַוָּה) father of Cain (קַיִן) Abel (הֶבֶל) and Seth (שֵׁת)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Adam (אָדָם) who was born after the death of Abel (הֶבֶל)
= causative action by which deities call objects to existence
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= man; ◄ second son of Adam (אָדָם) and Eve (חַוָּה) ► who became a keeper of sheep, but then was killed by his older brother Cain (קַיִן)
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man; ◄ son of Seth (שֵׁת) ► father of Kenan (קֵינָן)
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which humans or deities start performing an event
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
